ReExhibit VisualCache Prototype

Thanks for checking out this prototype!

Here's how it works:

  • Get your mobile phone
  • Start scanning VisualCache codes with your phone's camera
  • The VisualCache code will take you to your own collection
  • Keep scanning VisualCache codes, and watch your collection grow!
